awd_titl_txt: RUI:  Effects of Continuum Structure in Photodetachment and Recombination Processes in Atomic Theory
awd_abstract_narration: This project is concerned with extending projection                        operator formalism and combining it with a density matrix                       approach in order to describe photorecombination processes.                     The theoretical work is laid out so that some of it may be                      performed by undergraduate research assistants.                                      The work is a continuation of previous work done by the                    principal investigator in collaboration with Dr. John Cooper                    of the University of Colorado and Dr. Verne Jacobs of the                       Naval Research Laboratory, and the proposed work relies on a                    continuation of this collaboration.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
